cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.ST

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of best arm identification in stochastic bandit problems, which is a fundamental problem in machine learning and optimization. The paper proposes a new algorithm for the problem and provides new lower bounds for the special case of two arms. This makes it likely to belong to the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), information theory (cs.IT), and statistics (cs.ST).
